name: Magic Stones
description:
A game made for the Neumont Game Jam - March 2022 Break Edition with the theme of Strange Powerups. Codeveloped by myself and Alayna Garry

Strange creatures and stones have appeared around town and in the forest. It is your job to investigate and eliminate all the creatures.

Controls

WASD - Move

E - Activate Stones

Left Click - Attack

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause
